name: libredirect
description: Redirects YouTube, Twitter, Instagram and more to privacy friendly frontends.

scripts.instances: python3 src/instances/get_instances.py; git update-index --assume-unchanged src/instances/blacklist.json src/instances/data.json

author: LibRedirect
